name: Business Integration Partners Belgium
goal:
Bip is a leading European consulting company with more that 1.800 professionals working in 11 countries on more than 1.500 different projects. The aim of BIP to deliver excellent services with an ethical and loyal approach to clients, finding innovative solutions to traditional problems.
Bip provides management consulting and business integration services on all the markets, from Public Administration to Telco, from Energy and Utilities to banking and finance.
interests: Budget, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
BIP is following the implementation and regulation of the IT market and the legislative evolution, therefore in the last year the following files has been followed:
- Towards a Digital Single Market Act (2015/2147(INI))
- Programme on interoperability solutions for European public administrations, businesses and citizens (ISA2) (2014/0185(COD)
)
- Adequacy of the consumer related legislative framework to the digital sphere (2015/2148(INI))
